OnCollision3D(FrameBase, CollisionInfo3D)

Called once per frame while two non-trigger 3D colliders are touching.

public void OnCollision3D(FrameBase f, CollisionInfo3D info)

Parameters

f FrameBase

The frame in which the collision happened.

info CollisionInfo3D

The Quantum.CollisionInfo3D with data about the collision.

Called once two non-trigger 3D colliders stop touching.

Parameters

f FrameBase

The frame in which the entities stopped touching.

info ExitInfo3D
